description: NASA’s Curiosity rover has shared a new panorama from high on Mount Sharp, created from images taken across two Martian days. The colour-tinted view highlights changing light conditions and ancient boxwork formations shaped by groundwater, offering fresh insight into Mars’ past and the rover’s ongoing exploration inside Gale Crater.
title: NASA’s Curiosity Rover Sends Stunning New Panorama From High on Mount Sharp on Mars

description: Hubble Telescope observations have revealed a dense gas wake in Betelgeuse’s atmosphere, confirming the presence of a hidden companion star named Siwarha. The discovery explains the red supergiant’s unusual brightness changes and offers new insight into how massive stars evolve and shed material before becoming supernovae.
title: Hubble Telescope Detects Wake of Betelgeuse’s Hidden Companion Star, Confirming Long-Held Theory

description: Meta’s Reality Labs Head is reportedly calling for an urgent all-hands meeting next week. As per the report, it is internally being called the most important meeting of the year, raising alarms across the division. While the agenda was not disclosed, it is believed that the executive can take some decisive steps owing to the recurring losses suffered by the division.
title: Meta’s Reality Labs Chief Reportedly Summons Team for a Major All-Hands Meeting Next Week

description: Gmail’s Help Me Write is an AI tool that helps users draft and refine emails quickly. Powered by Google’s Gemini models, it can generate full messages from simple prompts or improve existing text by adjusting tone, length, and clarity. The feature works directly inside Gmail and can summarise content or rephrase sentences. Help Me Write is available on desktops and mobile devices through Gmail, Google Docs, and other Workspace apps, and supports personal Google accounts as well as eligible Workspace subscriptions, depending on admin settings.
title: Help Me Write Feature on Gmail Explained: What Is It, How to Use, and More

description: The Redmi Note 15 has a premium design and a sleek profile. The handset packs a vivid 6.77-inch Full HD+ AMOLED display with good viewing angles. The handset also comes loaded with a Qualcomm Snapdragon 6 Gen 3 processor, which feels a bit underwhelming compared to the competition. The phone also packs a dual-camera setup. The device also features a 5,520 mAh battery and supports 45W fast charging. Check out the review to know more about the latest Redmi device.
title: Redmi Note 15 5G Review: Premium Design Meets Everyday Reliability

description: The Consumer Electronics Show (CES) 2026 now wrapped up. Touted to be one of the world’s biggest technology showcases, CES has long been the stage where the tech industry sets the tone for the year ahead, and the 2026 edition was no different. From innovative PC form factors and AI computing to concept devices and smarter home entertainment solutions, the event demonstrated the extent to which technology is being integrated into daily life.
title: Best of CES 2026: Gadgets That Stole the Show from LG, Motorola, Samsung, and More

description: Here’s a look at some of the best smartphones you can buy in India under Rs. 20,000 in 2026. The list includes Moto G67 Power, Realme P4 5G, iQOO Z10R, Vivo T4R 5G, and Oppo K13x 5G. The listed models offer a balance of performance, camera abilities, battery life, and gaming features. Some models offer software support for a longer period. Readers are advised to compare the prices of these models across different platforms before buying.
title: Best Smartphones Under 20,000 to Buy in India in 2026: Moto G67 Power, Realme P4 5G, and More

description: X has reportedly restricted Grok AI image generation and editing to paid users after backlash over sexually explicit and violent deepfake images. The tool had allowed users to manipulate photos, often targeting women. According to new reports, the move followed pressure from UK authorities and threats of regulatory action. Government sources urged Ofcom to use its powers under the Online Safety Act, including possible restrictions on X. Non-paying users can still access limited image tools through Grok’s separate app and website.
title: Elon Musk’s X Limits Grok AI Image Generation to Paid Subscribers Following Deepfake Backlash: Report

description: Microsoft, on Thursday, introduced Copilot Checkout, a new artificial intelligence (AI)-powered shopping experience for its chatbot that allows users to make purchases right from the chat window. With this release, the Redmond-based tech giant has joined OpenAI, Google, and Perplexity in the rising trend of AI shopping tools. While the tech giant is a late entrant in this space, it has already forged partnerships with Shopify, PayPal, and Stripe for the capability.
title: Microsoft’s Copilot Checkout Will Let Users Search, Purchase Products Without Leaving the Chat Window

description: The Redmi Note 15 has a premium design and a sleek profile. The handset packs a vivid 6.77-inch Full HD+ AMOLED display with good viewing angles. The handset also comes loaded with a Qualcomm Snapdragon 6 Gen 3 processor, which feels a bit underwhelming compared to the competition. The phone also packs a dual-camera setup. The device also features a 5,520 mAh battery and supports 45W fast charging. Check out the review to know more about the latest Redmi device.
title: Redmi Note 15 5G Review: Premium Design Meets Everyday Reliability

description: Bixby, on an unspecified beta version of the upcoming Android 16-based OneUI 8.5 update, was spotted using Perplexity's capabilities to answer complex queries. Now, an X user claims that Samsung could also integrate DeepSeek's generative AI features to power Bixby Live on OneUI 8.5, along with Perplexity. Samsung is reportedly making the move to compete with Google's Gemini Live assistant. Bixby could also get new features in the future, including generating answers based on a phone's camera feed.
title: Samsung’s Bixby on OneUI 8.5 Said to Be Powered by With DeepSeek, Perplexity AI Features

description: Amazon Great Republic Day Sale 2026 will commence in India on January 16, the e-commerce giant announced on Friday. This comes soon after the US-based company teased that the upcoming sale event will start soon. The company is celebrating India’s 77th Republic Day, which is scheduled to take place on January 26. However, the e-commerce platform has yet to reveal the duration of the Amazon Great Republic Day Sale 2026. Amazon’s competitor, Flipkart, also recently announced that its Republic Day Sale 2026 will begin on January 17.
title: Amazon Great Republic Day Sale 2026 Date Announced: See Bank Discounts, Offers

description: Honor Magic 8 RSR Porsche Design is said to be in the works as the next entrant in the company's Magic 8  series. Ahead of the formal announcement, the launch date and alleged promotional images of the phone have leaked online. The new model will succeed the Honor Magic 7 RSR Porsche Design, which was launched in 2024. It is said to include a 200-megapixel periscope telephoto camera and a 7,200mAh battery.
title: Honor Magic 8 RSR Porsche Design Launch Date and Specifications Leaked

description: Apple CEO Tim Cook is reportedly overburdened with responsibilities and wants to reduce his workload. As per the report, the chief executive, who turned 65 in November 2025, is considering stepping down from his position to enjoy a quieter pace of life. The successor to Steve Jobs is one of the longest-serving CEOs in Silicon Valley, which can make his departure a particularly turbulent period for the company.
title: Is Tim Cook Leaving Apple? New Reports Suggest CEO May Step Down

description: Jujutsu Kaisen returns with Season 3 on Crunchyroll, launching the intense Culling Game arc on January 8, 2026. With weekly episodes, global simulcast, and an IMDb rating of 8.6/10, the anime continues its dominance.
title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 3 Now Streaming Online: Everything You Need to Know

description: NASA’s Artemis 2 mission could launch astronauts around the moon in February, marking the first human flight to lunar space since Apollo 17. The crew will test Orion’s systems on a free-return trajectory and prepare for future lunar landings, paving the way for Artemis 3 and NASA’s goal of establishing a long-term human presence on the moon.
title: NASA May Launch Historic Artemis 2 Moon Mission in Just One Month, Astronauts Ready for Flight

description: Oppo Reno 15c 5G has launched in India with sales set for February. The phone is priced at Rs. 34,999 for the 8GB RAM variant and Rs. 37,999 for the 12GB option. It features a 6.57-inch AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate, Snapdragon 6 Gen 1 chipset, Android 16-based ColorOS 16, and a 7,000mAh battery with 80W fast charging. The handset also offers a 50-megapixel triple rear camera setup and an IP66, IP68, and IP69-rated build.
title: Oppo Reno 15c 5G Launched in India With 7,000mAh Battery, Snapdragon 6 Gen 1 SoC: Price, Features

description: Red Magic 11 Air is scheduled to launch in China soon. The imminent arrival of the upcoming thin and light smartphone was recently confirmed by the Red Magic General Manager Jiang Chao in a post on Weibo. While the company has yet to reveal other details about the handset, including its exact launch date, specifications, features, design, colourways, and pricing in China, it is tipped to be powered by Qualcomm’s octa Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, which was released in 2024. Now, another has revealed the dimensions, display, battery capacity, and charging support of the Red Magic 11 Air.
title: Red Magic 11 Air Key Specifications Leaked Ahead of Launch; Could Arrive With 7,000mAh Battery

description: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms is an upcoming fantasy drama and official Game of Thrones prequel adapted from George R. R. Martin’s Tales of Dunk and Egg. Set a century before the events of GOT, the series follows Ser Duncan the Tall and Prince Aegon Targaryen.
title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Game of Thrones Prequel Online?

description: Crypto markets traded sideways as Bitcoin held near the $90,000 mark amid cautious sentiment. Analysts said repeated rejections near key resistance levels have kept prices range-bound as investors await major macro triggers, including the US jobs report and a Supreme Court decision on trade tariffs. Ethereum and large-cap altcoins showed mixed movement, while experts said the market remains in a consolidation phase.
title: Bitcoin Trades Flat as Crypto Markets Enter Consolidation Phase, Traders Remain Cautious

description: Gurram Paapi Reddy is a Telugu OTT release streaming on Z5 from January 16, 2026. Directed by Murali Manohar Reddy, the film follows a strange corpse exchange that leads three hired men into unexpected danger. Known for its light humour and family-friendly appeal, the movie gained word-of-mouth popularity as an easy, stress-free watch.
title: Gurram Paapi Reddy OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Gadgets 360 attended a select media briefing with Xiaomi's HQ team to understand 2026 outlook where Adam Zeng, Senior Vice President, Xiaomi Group and President, International Business Department, Alvin T, VP, Xiaomi International, and Sudhin Mathur, Chief Operating Officer, Xiaomi India, walked us through some of the big highlights the brand will be following up on this year. The company will also be focusing on non-phone categories this year.
title: India Matters More Than Ever: Inside Xiaomi’s 2026 Strategy to Reclaim Market Mojo

description: Homegrown brand Lava is gearing up to launch a new smartphone in India. The company recently shared a teaser for an upcoming handset on a microblogging site, revealing a key design element. It is teased to feature a dual display, with the secondary screen located at the back of the phone, alongside the camera island. While the company has yet to reveal any details, the upcoming Lava smartphone is seen with dual rear cameras.
title: Lava Says Next Smartphone Will Sport a Xiaomi 17 Pro-Inspired Feature

description: Mask is a dark comedy thriller film that centres around a corrupt detective who is set to retrieve 440 crores of stolen black money. What unfolds next brings chaos, drama, and comedy.
title: Mask Streaming On Zee 5: Everything You Need to Know About Plot, Cast, and More

description: Realme 16 Pro 5G was launched in India on January 6, along with the Realme 16 Pro+ 5G. The new smartphones are now on sale in the country via Flipkart and the Realme India online store. The Realme 16 Pro 5G is offered in Master Gold, Pebble Grey, and India-exclusive Orchid Purple colourways, while the Realme 16 Pro+ 5G is available in Master Gold, Master Grey, and India-exclusive Camellia Pink colour options. Both handsets are equipped with 7,000mAh Titan batteries with support for 80W wired fast charging. The Pro+ is powered by a Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 chipset.
title: Realme 16 Pro Series With 200-Megapixel Camera Goes on Sale in India: See Price, Offers, Features

description: Realme Neo 8 is all set to go official next week. Ahead of the formal debut, the handset has surfaced on benchmarking website Geekbench, hinting at its key specifications. The phone was spotted with the Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 SoC, 16GB RAM and Android 16. It is expected to come with upgrades over the Realme Neo 7.
title: Realme Neo 8 With Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 SoC Visits Geekbench Ahead of Launch in China

description: OpenAI for Healthcare was introduced on Thursday as a new suite of artificial intelligence (AI) tools designed for hospitals, doctors, and other healthcare institutions. The main offering is a custom-designed version of its chatbot, dubbed ChatGPT for Healthcare. The San Francisco-based AI giant says the tools will enable the institutions to offer more consistent and high-quality care for patients, while remaining compliant with national security and privacy standards.
title: After Users, OpenAI Now Wants Hospitals and Doctors to Use ChatGPT

description: Oppo is developing two foldable smartphones for 2026 as part of its next-generation Find series, according to a report. One of the models is said to be the Oppo Find N7, which could be launched in the second half of this year. As per the report, the purported book-style foldable is expected to sport a wider form factor, offering a broader viewing area. Meanwhile, the company is also reportedly gearing up to launch the Oppo Find N6 in China next month.
title: Oppo Find N7 to Feature Wider Book-Style Display as Find N6 China Launch Nears: Report

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 series could go official next month. Recent reports suggest that the majority of the new lineup will be equipped with Qualcomm's Snapdragon chipsets. Qualcomm is also said to be in talks with Samsung Electronics for manufacturing the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 using Samsung's 2nm manufacturing process. The chip is currently produced by TSMC using a 3nm process.
title: Qualcomm Suggests Its Chips Will Power Most Galaxy S26 Models; Samsung May Produce 2nm Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5: Reports

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra is tipped to receive a major charging upgrade, with leaks pointing to 60W fast wired charging. Tipster Ice Universe claims internal tests show the phone can charge from 0 to 75 percent in 30 minutes under controlled conditions. Earlier sightings on China’s 3C site also suggest 60W support and no charger in the box. The upgrade may debut as Super Fast Charging 3.0, alongside reported 25W Qi2 wireless charging, ahead of a possible February 2026 launch.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra to Launch With Much-Awaited 60W Fast Charging Upgrade, Tipster Claims

description: Tecno Spark Go 3 will be launched in India by the Chinese smartphone maker on January 16 at 12pm local time, the company announced on Friday. A dedicated microsite for the smartphone on Amazon is now live, revealing the phone's availability, features, design, and a colour option. It is claimed to ship with an IP64 rating for dust and splash resistance. Its predecessor, the Spark Go 2, was launched in India in June 2025 with a 5,000mAh battery and an Unisoc T7250 chipset.
title: Tecno Spark Go 3 India Launch Date, Design Revealed; Will Go on Sale via Amazon

description: Amazon Great Republic Day Sale 2026 will kick off soon in India, the US-based e-commerce platform announced on Friday. The upcoming sale event will offer an instant discount of 10 percent on SBI Credit Card and EMI transactions to customers. During the sale event, the company will list its daily “8 pm Deals”, “Trending Deals”, “Blockbuster Deals”, “Blockbuster Deals with Exchange”, and “Top 100 Deals”, according to the dedicated microsite for the sale event on Amazon.
title: Amazon Great Republic Day Sale 2026 to Start Soon; Discounts, Bank Offers Teased

description: Google is rolling out a major set of Gemini-powered artificial intelligence (AI) features in Gmail. Announced on Thursday, the Mountain View-based tech giant said these new capabilities bring Gmail to the “Gemini era.” The most notable is the integration of AI Overviews, which now powers the search experience and email summaries in threads with large numbers of replies.
title: Google Brings Gmail to the Gemini Era With AI Overviews Integration and a New Inbox

description: The Realme Neo 8 launch date has been announced by the company. The upcoming handset is expected to be introduced in China as the successor to the Realme Neo 7, which debuted in December 2024. Alongside its launch date confirmation, the brand has also teased a key detail about the smartphone’s display. The Realme Neo 8 is confirmed to be equipped with a screen sourced from Samsung Display, corroborating previous leaks.
title: Realme Neo 8 China Launch Date Announced; Company Teases Display Details

description: YouTube has updated its search filters to improve content discovery and make advanced search tools easier to use. The changes add a new Shorts filter that allows users to choose between short and long-form videos. YouTube has also renamed the Sort By menu to Prioritise and replaced the View count option with a Popularity filter that considers watch time and relevance. The platform has removed the Upload Date – Last Hour and Sort by Rating filters and simplified the overall filter layout across web and mobile apps.
title: YouTube Updates Search Filters With New Shorts Option and Simplified Sorting

description: Apple’s iOS 26 has been downloaded and installed by only a small percentage of iPhone users, according to a report citing data from a web analytics service. The reason behind this is said to be the new Liquid Glass design, which was met with criticism for causing legibility issues due to the transparent UI elements. Moreover, iOS 26’s adoption rate is significantly lower than the previous OS versions at the same time after their release, the report highlighted. After receiving flak from users, Apple started rolling out options to adjust the opacity of the UI elements, allowing users to make widgets and dialogue boxes less transparent.
title: iOS 26 Adoption Rate Notably Lower Than Previous Versions Months After Launch: Report

description: Redmi Note 15 5G goes on sale in India today. The new Note series smartphone will be available to purchase via the Xiaomi India website, retail partners, and Amazon. As part of the sale, Redmi is offering some bank-based discounts for customers. The Redmi Note 15 5G features a 6.77-inch AMOLED display and a Snapdragon 6 Gen 3 chipset. It carries a dual rear camera unit headlined by a 108-megapixel primary sensor.
title: Redmi Note 15 5G Goes on Sale in India for the First Time Today: Price, Specifications, Sale Offers

description: The Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold is the latest innovation from the brand. The handset comes equipped with a 10-inch main display that folds twice. The foldable smartphone also packs a 6.5-inch cover display. The device is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy devices. In terms of optics, you get a triple-camera setup on the rear panel, along with a 10-megapixel front camera and a 10-megapixel sensor on the main display.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold First Impressions

description: Samsung Galaxy M17e 5G has reportedly been spotted on the Google Play Console Supported Devices list. The listing reveals the model number SM-M076B and the codename A07x, suggesting it may be a rebranded version of the Galaxy A07 5G. The unusual “e” branding hints at a shift in Samsung’s budget naming strategy. The device may share specifications with the purported Galaxy A07 5G, including a Dimensity 6300 SoC, 8GB RAM, Android 16, and a 6,000mAh battery.
title: Samsung Galaxy M17e 5G Reportedly Listed on Google Play Console; Could Arrive With Familiar Specifications

description: Vivo X200T is expected to launch soon, and details about the phone have been surfacing online for a couple of months. A new leak has suggested the full specifications of this model. It is tipped to come with a MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ SoC and a 6,200mAh battery. The phone could sport a 6.67-inch AMOLED display with 1.5K resolution. It may ship with Android 16, and Vivo is expected to provide five major Android OS updates and seven years of security patches for the phone.
title: Vivo X200T Leak Reveals Detailed Specifications Including MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ SoC, 6,200mAh Battery

description: The Google Pixel 9 series could soon benefit from compatibility with Apple’s AirDrop feature, according to a report. In November, the Mountain View-based tech giant announced that Android users could now share files securely and wirelessly with iPhone owners, and vice versa, using both Quick Share and AirDrop. This functionality, however, was limited to the latest Pixel 10 models. The report mentions that this feature is in development for older Pixel models too, beginning with the Pixel 9 series.
title: Google Pixel 9 Series May Reportedly Get AirDrop Support in Quick Share for File Transfers

description: The OnePlus Turbo 6 and Turbo 6V were recently announced as the company’s first smartphones of 2026 in China. Another OnePlus handset, however, may be on the cards, too. According to a tipster, the China-based brand is said to be developing a new smartphone powered by the flagship MediaTek Dimensity 9500 chipset. It is expected to feature a flat OLED screen, large and rounded corners and a 9,000mAh-class battery.
title: Mystery OnePlus Phone With Dimensity 9500 Chip Tipped; May Feature 165Hz Display and 9,000mAh Battery
